pathAssistantSteps.info:
• Learn from customer and work with teammates to refine solution details (e.g., product options, projection data) and presentation.
  • Revise quote information to reflect anticipated dates / timing as well as proposed product configuration options, pricing, and transaction info / projection data.
  • Update Quote Status to "Review" to trigger internal approval processes; This will auto-advance Opportunity Stage to "Value Prop."

• Potential for new business or a renewal sale has been identified
  • Initiate contact with customer to provide overview of services targeting specific drug(s)
  • Create quote draft with baseline service information
  • To add drugs, you MUST Quick Save your quote AFTER adding service info and BEFORE adding drugs.
  • Opportunity Amount and Opportunity Products will reflect the information on your primary quote.

• Quote is being reviewed for approval and/or auto-approves when applicable
  • Once quote is fully approved, Quote Status will auto-update to "Approved," Opportunity Stage will auto-advance to "Negotiate," and proposal with approved pricing can be finalized.
